column2: An interviewer asks four people two questions. Listen and complete the sentences.
column3:
He thinks {{c1::unemployment}} is a big problem.

He thinks {{c1::tolerance}} is very important.
column5:
What do you think is our biggest social problem right now?

I'd say unemployment.  If there's no work, everything else starts to go wrong.

OK.  A different question.  What quality do you most admire in people?

I think tolerance is very important.  We must all learn to live together even if we don't agree with one another.

column2: An interviewer asks four people two questions. Listen and complete the sentences.
column3:
She thinks {{c1::climate change}} is our biggest problem.

{{c1::Honesty}} is something that she admires.
column5:
What do you think is the biggest problem in the world today?

Our biggest problem right now has to be climate change.  If we don't do something about that, we'll be in trouble.

OK.  And what quality do you admire most in people?

I'd say honesty.  I like people who are honest, people who tell the truth.

column2: An interviewer asks four people two questions. Listen and complete the sentences.
column3:
She thinks {{c1::inequality}} is our biggest problem.

{{c1::Generosity}} is a quality that she admires.
column5:
What do you think is the world’s biggest problem right now?

I believe our biggest problem is inequality between people.  Some people are very rich and many others are very poor.  The difference is too great. 

OK.  Next question.  What quality do you most admire in people?

The quality I most admire in people is generosity.  I like people who are generous, people who are happy to give.

column2: An interviewer asks four people two questions. Listen and complete the sentences.
column3:
He says {{c1::disease}} and {{c1::hunger}} are serious problems in many parts of the world.

The quality he admires most is {{c1::politeness}}.
column5:
What do you think is the biggest problem for the world right now?

I think disease and hunger are very serious problems in many parts of the world.  Too many people don't have enough to eat and many are dying of illnesses that can be prevented.

OK.  And what quality do you most admire in people?

I like politeness.  Life is better if people are polite to one another.
